query: SELECT pl.productCode, COUNT(*) as cnt, SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) as total_qty FROM purchaseLines pl JOIN purchases p ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000892' GROUP BY pl.productCode ORDER BY pl.productCode
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xdfM6hBeGk8i8i.5dbeac8a2102 --database DxAqoJ22pGdNTCdjRs8uzu --execute SELECT pl.productCode, COUNT(*) as cnt, SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) as total_qty FROM purchaseLines pl JOIN purchases p ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000892' GROUP BY pl.productCode ORDER BY pl.productCode
